name: Trinket & Tail
description:
This game was made for Wowie Jam 4.0. Theme: "Collaborate With AI".

Trinket & Tail is an Endless Flyer game starring a bird and a robot. This is the first game we have ever released to the wild.

All of the art was created by Kaitlin West for Wowie Jam 4.0 (Other than the skybox and particle effects). She did an incredible job creating the art assets and animation frames within a 72 hour time limit.

Controls:

Left click to fly. Tap A & D to fly backwards and forwards. The robot, Trinket, will shoot automatically.

Credits:

Robin Cormie - Game Design, Programming.
Kaitlin West - Game Design, Art, and Animation.

Additional Credits:

Valem - Make your own Flappy Bird in 10 minutes (Unity Tutorial)

Brackeys - How to make a CUT THE ROPE Replica in Unity (Livestream Tutorial)

yd - Another space background track, Spacelife #14

rpgwhitelock - AllSky - 220+ Sky / Skybox Set
